t: Amazon.com: PROFOOT Callus Blaster Gel Callus Remover, 4.2 fl oz : Health & Household
s: Anyway, it seems to me that many reviews are exaggerating the results, or they have softer calluses than me. I have used it around 4-5 times over 2-3 weeks, and my feet are indeed getting softer, but the calluses are not completely gone yet. In my case, the dead skin is not just peeling off.
